original_title: Lack of funding for A’pura Poson programme: Govt. refutes allegations
original_body_lines: The government refutes allegations by various parties about a lack of funding for the Anuradhapura Poson programme, the President's Media Division (PMD) said.
They said two ministries and one department have already granted Rs. 28.8 million.
After 2019, the highest allocation made by the Buddhasasana Ministry for the Poson Mihintale Perahera was made this year.
